languages.text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next attack deals +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% more damage. If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next attack will deal {uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% more damage. If that loss caused the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} to gain an injury or trauma, this bonus damage increases to {uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

Whenever the Bladedancer loses any number of wounds, they gain the same number of stacks of the blood for blood effect. Blood for Blood: the Bladedancer's next attack deals +number of Blood for Blood stacks% additional damage.

Whenever the Bladedancer loses any number of wounds, they gain the same number of stacks of the blood for blood effect. Blood for Blood: the Bladedancer's next attack deals +number of Blood for Blood stacks% additional damage.

If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} pierde cualquier cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, su siguiente ataque inflige un +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} % de daño. Si la pérdida de heridas hace que el hoja danzante sufra una lesión o una aflicción, el aumento de daño se incrementa a +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} %.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next attack deals +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% more damage. If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} pierde cualquier cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, su siguiente ataque inflige un +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} % de daño. Si la pérdida de heridas hace que el hoja danzante sufra una lesión o una aflicción, el aumento de daño se incrementa a +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} %.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が任意の数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失うと、次の攻撃は+{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%のダメージを与える。もしその結果ブレードダンサーが負傷をしたり外傷を受けたりすると、ボーナスダメージが+{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%増加する。
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next attack deals +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% more damage. If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が任意の数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失うと、次の攻撃は+{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%のダメージを与える。もしその結果ブレードダンサーが負傷をしたり外傷を受けたりすると、ボーナスダメージが+{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%増加する。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}损失任意数量的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，下次攻击造成的伤害提高+{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%。如果损失生命值时触发了“伤势”或“创伤”效果，则伤害加成提高至+{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%。
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next attack deals +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% more damage. If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}损失任意数量的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，下次攻击造成的伤害提高+{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%。如果损失生命值时触发了“伤势”或“创伤”效果，则伤害加成提高至+{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%。

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} subit des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, sa prochaine attaque inflige +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} % de dégâts supplémentaires. S'il subit en plus une lésion ou un traumatisme, le bonus de dégâts est de +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} %.

languages.text: Hat der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} eine beliebige Zahl von {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verloren, verursacht sein nächster Angriff +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} % mehr Schaden. Erleidet der Klingentänzer durch diesen Verlust eine Verletzung oder ein Trauma, erhöht sich der Bonusschaden auf +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} %.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next attack deals +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% more damage. If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.

traits.locale_text: Hat der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} eine beliebige Zahl von {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verloren, verursacht sein nächster Angriff +{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} % mehr Schaden. Erleidet der Klingentänzer durch diesen Verlust eine Verletzung oder ein Trauma, erhöht sich der Bonusschaden auf +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} %.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} теряет любое количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, его следующая атака наносит на {uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}% больше урона. Если при потере здоровья он получает ранение или травму, то прибавка к урону составляет +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} loses any number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain the same number of {g|f:ee397fd185b64632a0dff019b830f486}blood for blood{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Теряя любое количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} получает такое же количество уровней эффекта {g|f:ee397fd185b64632a0dff019b830f486}кровь за кровь{/g}.

Теряя любое количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} получает такое же количество уровней эффекта {g|f:ee397fd185b64632a0dff019b830f486}кровь за кровь{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, herhangi bir miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kaybettiğinde bir sonraki saldırısı +%{uip|DamageBonusWounds|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} daha fazla hasar verir. Bu kayıp, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın sakatlık veya travmaya uğramasına sebep olursa bonus hasar, yükselerek +%{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169} olur.

If that loss causes the Bladedancer to suffer an injury or trauma, the bonus damage increases to +{uip|DamageBonusInjury|d6e4a21bf78c494e8e9b3d3b6ecca169}%.
